original: intros f g a b H1 H2. unfold RInt. unfold ex_RInt in H1, H2. destruct H1 as [If1 H1]. destruct H2 as [If2 H2]. unfold RInt, ex_RInt. exists (plus If1 If2). apply filterlim_ext with (fun ptd : SF_seq => scal (sign (b - a)) (Riemann_sum (fun x : R => plus (f x) (g x)) ptd)). intros ptd. unfold scal, sign. rewrite <- Riemann_sum_minus. rewrite H1. rewrite H2. reflexivity. apply is_RInt. apply filterlim_RInt. apply Riemann_fine_filter. intros g0 h Hg Filterlim. apply ex_RInt_point.
